pages.text: Allahe ka’le, ‘he ibalicha! Tomara ki ha’la, tumi kiya chajadahakarai sakalara antarbhukta naha’la’
si ka’le, ‘(he allaha!) Tumi gandhayukta bokara sukana tim tim sabda karaa ka’labaraniya matira paraa yi manuha srsti karaicha ma'i taka chajadaha nakarao’
Te'om ka’le, ‘tente ta'i iyara paraa ola'i ya, karana niscaya ta'i abhisapta
arau niscaya pratidana dirasa laike tora oparata thakila abhisampata
Si ka’le, ‘he mora raba! Teneha’le moka arakasa diya se'i dinalaike, yidina sihamtaka punaraujjiraita karaa ha’ba’
Te'om ka’le, ‘ya, niscaya toka arakasa diya ha’la
‘sunirdista samaya ahara dina paryanta’

Si ka’le, ‘he mora raba! Tumi ye moka bipathagami karaila se'i babe arasye ma'i prthiraita papakarmasamuhaka manuhara ocarata sobhaniya karai tulima arau arasye ami sihamtara ata'ike bipathagami karaima
‘kintu sihamtara majata tomara ekanistha bandasakalara bahirae’
Allahe ka’le, ‘e'itorae mora ocaralai ahara sarala patha’
‘Niscaya mora bandasakalara oparata tomara kono ksamata na'i, kintu pathabhrastasakalara bahirae yisakale tomaka anusarana karaiba’
‘niscaya jahannama sihamta sakalorae pratisrauta sthana’
‘se'itora satakhana duraara ache, pratyeka duraaraerae praraesa karaibalai (cayatanara anusaraisakalara babe) nirdista ansa ache’
Niscaya muttakbisakala thakiba jannatata arau prasraranasamuhara majata
Te'omlokaka koraa ha’ba, ‘tomaloke santi arau niraapattara saite iyata praraesa karaa’
Arau ami te'omlokara antarara paraa hinsa bidbesa amtaraa'i dima; te'omloke bhatrra darae parasparae ijane sijanara sanmukhara asanata arasthana karaiba
tata te'omlokaka arasade (klantiye) sparsa nakaraiba arau tara paraa te'omlokaka bahiskrta'o karaa naha’ba
Mora bandasakalaka jana'i diya ye, niscaya ma'i parama ksamasila, parama dayalu
arau niscaya mora sastiye'i haiche yantranadayaka sasti
arau tumi sihamtaka jana'i diya, ibraahimara atithisakalara katha
